SEARCH
Package com.zebra.sdk.comm

Interface StatusConnection

All Superinterfaces:
Connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
StatusConnectionWithWriteLogging
All Known Implementing Classes:
BluetoothLeStatusConnection, BluetoothStatusConnection, BluetoothStatusConnectionInsecure, ConnectionStatusA, TcpStatusConnection
public interface StatusConnection extends Connection
A status connection to a Link-OS printer. The status connection requires Link-OS firmware 2.5 or higher. This connection will not block the printing channel, nor can it print.

  • Method Summary
